page.title: 04LAW AND ORDER
page.content: LAW AND ORDER _____________ There are three police stations in our area,at Rachub,Tregarth and Bethesda.The station at Rachub is unmanned,the same as many other areas in North Wales.Welsh speaking policemen are scarce.Many people would like to see the return of the village policeman. There is a lot of vandalism,housebreaking and hooliganism in our district.When the criminals are arrested they are taken to Bangor police station,about 4 miles away.The Magistrste court sits at Bangor,but the serious crimes are dealt with by the Crown court usually at Caernarfon,Mold or Chester.A policeman will help if you are in any trouble-he is our friend.
